events.message: We have received your application for the software engineer position at TechCorp, and our recruitment team will begin reviewing it shortly.
Your application has been categorised under Engineering, specifically for the software developer role based on your resume keywords.
A dedicated recruiter has been assigned to your case to assist you throughout the hiring process for the engineering position.
The initial screening was completed successfully, highlighting your strong background in software development and relevant technologies.
Thank you for your prompt response to the screening questions, showing enthusiasm for the software engineer role with TechCorp.
Your technical interview with the senior development team has been scheduled for May 20th at 10 AM UTC to evaluate your coding and problem-solving skills.
You completed the technical interview successfully, impressing the panel with your software engineering knowledge and practical expertise.
The HR interview has been scheduled for May 25th at 11 AM UTC to discuss company culture, benefits, and your career aspirations.
The HR interview went well, with mutual interest expressed between you and TechCorp regarding your potential fit and future growth.
We are pleased to propose an employment offer for the software engineer position at TechCorp, including competitive salary and benefits.
You have responded positively to the offer, requesting minor clarifications which we are happy to address promptly.
Congratulations on accepting the offer! We are excited to welcome you aboard as a software engineer at TechCorp.
Your onboarding process has started, including IT setup, orientation schedule, and introductory meetings with your engineering team.
The hiring process for the software engineer role is now closed successfully with your official start completed and all paperwork finalized.
